summary: Project focused on admin panel access changes (temporarily removing admin authentication) and adding a customer profile section with a unique ID concept for admin/login flow.

existing_features.title: Disable the admin-route authentication gate so users can access the admin portal without logging in via Internet Identity (no redirect to `/admin/login` and no admin-status check) while this temporary mode is enabled.

Update the admin login page behavior for the temporary no-auth mode so it does not prompt for Internet Identity login; instead it should provide a simple message that admin authentication is currently disabled and a button/link to enter the admin portal.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove/disable authentication requirement for the admin panel temporarily (allow admin access without auth)
Add a customer profile section and include a unique ID field (for use in login/admin identification)

Temporarily disable backend admin permission enforcement for all admin-only endpoints so that admin UI operations (orders dashboard, order status updates, products CRUD, offers CRUD, customers list/detail) work without an authenticated admin principal while this temporary mode is enabled.

projectName: Temporarily disable admin authentication and admin permission checks
